edu.virginia.cs.cs1110.multimedia

Class Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.virginia.cs.cs1110.multimedia.SimplePicture
      • edu.virginia.cs.cs1110.multimedia.Picture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DigitalPicture

    public class Picture
extends SimplePicture
    A class that represents a picture. This class inherits from SimplePicture and allows the student to add functionality to the Picture class. Copyright Georgia Institute of Technology 2004-2005
    Author:
    Barbara Ericson ericson@cc.gatech.edu
